医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现患有炎症性关节病的男性生育能力并未下降《风湿病年鉴》在线发表的研究表明，患有类风湿性关节炎等炎症性关节疾病的男性比健康同龄人更不可能不生育，而且生育的孩子更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-finds-no-fertility-decline-in-men-with-炎症-joint-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-finds-no-fertility-decline-in-men-with-炎症-joint-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5b1d40b-7246-48e1-bee4-53edde83201f Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:27:33 -0500 Study finds no fertility decline in men with inflammatory joint disease
研究确定了影响早产治疗反应的遗传变异加州大学旧金山分校领导的一项研究首次发现了基因变异，可以预测患者是否会对早产治疗产生反应，早产是一种影响美国出生婴儿的十分之一的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-identizes-genic-variants-that-influence-response-to-preterm-birth-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-identizes-genic-variants-that-influence-response-to-preterm-birth-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72b6fea6-3025-4518-ace1-6483e83c6766 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:02:55 -0500 Study identifies genetic variants that influence response to preterm birth treatment
长期新冠肺炎和 ME/CFS 患者可以从协调的治疗策略中受益奥塔哥大学的一项新研究发现，患有长期新冠病毒或肌痛性脑脊髓炎/慢性疲劳综合症（ME/CFS）的人可以从协调的治疗策略中受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Long-COVID-and-MECFS-患者-could-benefit-from-a-cooperative-treatment-strategy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Long-COVID-and-MECFS-病人-could-benefit-from-a-cooperative-treatment-strategy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0e0fdbe-3879-4344-ad6b-14c125a453d5 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:56:18 -0500 Long COVID and ME/CFS patients could benefit from a coordinated treatment strategy
研究表明能量饮料消费频率与睡眠参数之间存在密切联系发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上的一项大型挪威研究发现，减少能量饮料与大学生睡眠质量差和失眠有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows-robust-link- Between-Frequency-of-energy-drink-conspiration-and-sleep-parameters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows-robust-link- Between-Frequency-of-energy-drink-conspiration-and-sleep-parameters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d9e5323-d095-4ca4-b31a-0f6b87e8aa1c Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:49:18 -0500 Study shows robust link between frequency of energy drink consumption and sleep parameters
研究发现后皮质萎缩可预测阿尔茨海默病由加州大学旧金山分校领导的一个国际研究小组完成了第一项关于后皮质萎缩的大规模研究，后皮质萎缩是一系列令人困惑的视觉空间症状，是阿尔茨海默病的第一个症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Posterior-cortical-atropy-predicts-Alzheimers-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Posterior-cortical-atropy-predicts-Alzheimers-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5ce6b12-b522-4007-a07b-4fecf9dea45b Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:42:54 -0500 Posterior cortical atrophy predicts Alzheimer's, study finds
对于不产生乳糖酶的成年人来说，增加牛奶摄入量可降低 2 型糖尿病的风险最近发表在《自然代谢》杂志上的一项研究的研究人员调查了乳糖酶非持续性个体中牛奶摄入量与 2 型糖尿病之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Increased-milk-intake-linked-with-a-decreased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-adults-who-do-not-生产乳糖酶.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Increased-milk-intake-linked-with-a-decreased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-adults-who-do-not-生产乳糖酶.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9d8d7e7-38cb-414e-b8ac-51e0ceeff385 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:49:00 -0500 Increased milk intake associated with a decreased risk of type 2 diabetes in adults who do not produce lactase
研究表明社交媒体如何加剧不快乐和物质主义您找不到比社交媒体更容易与他人进行比较的地方了。这对你不好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows-how-social-media-fuels-unhappiness-and-materialism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows-how-social-media-fuels-unhappiness-and-materialism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f793f33b-94a7-46fd-ac89-a06fea1c5f66 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:29:33 -0500 Study shows how social media fuels unhappiness and materialism
WFIRM 领导了价值 4000 万美元的再生医学计划，为伤者及其他患者提供服务维克森林再生医学研究所是维克森林大学医学院的一部分，已被选为武装部队再生医学研究所 (AFIRM) 联盟的领导者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/WFIRM-leads-2440M-rogenic-medicine-initiative-for-the-wounded-and-beyond.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/WFIRM-leads-2440M-rogenic-medicine-initiative-for-the-wounded-and-beyond.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d033624-7eb0-45fe-be49-84d1943e498d Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:23:40 -0500 WFIRM leads $40M regenerative medicine initiative for the wounded and beyond
微重力可能使太空蔬菜更容易滋生细菌生菜和其他绿叶蔬菜是健康、均衡饮食的一部分；即使对于执行任务的宇航员来说也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Microgravity-may-make-space-veggies-more-prone-to-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Microgravity-may-make-space-veggies-more-prone-to-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e3f5993-8cd8-402a-93cc-54fd8b513461 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:20:03 -0500 Microgravity may make space veggies more prone to bacteria
脑组织变薄可在症状出现前十年预测痴呆症德克萨斯大学健康科学中心的研究人员表示，在患有痴呆症的人中，一条称为皮质灰质的脑组织会变薄，这似乎是该疾病出现症状前 5 到 10 年的准确生物标志物。安东尼奥（也称为 UT Health San Antonio）报道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Thinning-brain-tissue-predicts-dementia-up-to-a-decade-before-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Thinning-brain-tissue-predicts-dementia-up-to-a-decade-before-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43609543-0cbd-437b-8a0d-3fd82b7a3dbf Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:06:11 -0500 Thinning brain tissue predicts dementia up to a decade before symptoms
